release_notes: Invoice payment schedules, VAT summaries, export workflow improvements, dark mode fixes
changelog: IMPROVED: Payment schedules show as actual invoice line items with dates and amounts
NEW: VAT/Tax summary on invoices (Subtotal ex VAT, VAT, Total)
IMPROVED: Only past payments recorded as transactions (future scheduled)
IMPROVED: Automatic total verification and rounding adjustment
FIX: Extended Check All button delay (2 sec) for ProSelect response
FIX: Added Cancel button click to close Export window
FIX: Invoice sync early return preventing GHL upload
FIX: Converted remaining MsgBox to DarkMsgBox for consistency
